com.newtouch.lion.exception

类 BaseException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.springframework.core.NestedRuntimeException
            • com.newtouch.lion.exception.BaseException
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    AppException, BusinessException, DaoException, DynamicsDataSourceTransactionException, ExcelException, MongoException, SystemException

    public class BaseException
extends org.springframework.core.NestedRuntimeException

    Title: 异常抽象类

    Description: 异常抽象类

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2014

    Company: Newtouch

    版本:
    1.0

    WangLijun

      代码消息为空

      BaseException(java.lang.String code, java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Throwable cause) 
      BaseException(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Construct a NestedRuntimeException with the specified detail message and nested exception.
